officialTitle: Is There an Adverse Drug Reaction Between Renin-Angiotensin System Blockade and Inhaled Anesthetics? - A Pilot Study. Optional Deoxyribo-Nucleic Acid Donation for the Study of Hypertension.
inclusionCriteria:
* age over 40
* composite head and neck tumor resection
* treated hypertension
* hypertension medications taken on morning of surgery (except diuretics)
* Must have minimum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* patient refusal
* age less than 40 or over 80 years
* combined surgical procedures
* emergency surgery
* Left ventricular ejection fraction less than 50 per cent
* calculated creatinine clearance less than 60 mL per minute
